description: This file defines a Python class 'DeepSeek' that extends 'OpenAILike' for interacting with DeepSeek models, including configuration attributes and a method to retrieve client parameters.

classes.name: DeepSeek
classes.description: A class for interacting with DeepSeek models, extending 'OpenAILike', with attributes for configuration and a method to get client parameters.

methods.name: _get_client_params
methods.description: Retrieves and constructs a dictionary of client parameters, fetching API key from environment if not set, and raising an error if missing.
